title: Material Research and Development for Transparent Solar Panels
description: Research and develop materials suitable for transparent solar panels that can be used for road surfaces.

title: Design of Durable Road Surface Structure
description: Design a road surface structure that can accommodate transparent solar panels and support safe vehicle transit.
dependencies: Material Research and Development for Transparent Solar Panels

title: Engineering Prototype Development
description: Develop prototypes of the road surface with integrated solar panels and test their durability, safety, and energy generation capabilities.
dependencies: Material Research and Development for Transparent Solar Panels
Design of Durable Road Surface Structure

title: Safety Testing and Regulation Compliance
description: Ensure the safety of the road surface, including slip resistance, reflectivity, and road markings, while meeting relevant traffic regulations.

title: Project Specification Document (PSD) Creation
description: Create a comprehensive project specification document detailing the design, materials, and safety requirements of the SolarRoadSurface.
